channel.title: Maven JSF2 on Oliver Wehrens
channel.description: Recent content in Maven JSF2 on Oliver Wehrens

item.title: Getting started with JSF 2 (and Maven)
item.description:
I use Apache Trinidad at work and since JSF 2 is now final I decided to play with it a bit.

Of course this is going to be the classic Hello World example (as there are many other like this around the web).

First you need to setup a simple Maven project.

The file layout should be something like that. After that change your pom.xml to include the servlet and jsf2 libs.
